message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the product's value is significantly higher than your proposed price. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000.  I believe this reflects its true worth while still offering you a competitive price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and my budget.
